revised_title: Calculating the Law of a Quadratic Functional of a Brownian Bridge
tldr: The authors calculate the law of a quadratic functional of a Brownian bridge, motivated by a model of polymers with bending moments in an elongational flow. They find that the partition function for a system of polymers of finite stiffness in an elongational flow is related to the joint law of a Brownian motion and a Brownian bridge. The authors also discuss the coil stretch transition, where the flow becomes so strong that the polymer undergoes an unbounded stretch.
